title: The Look: December’s Best-Dressed List
excerpt: Here are the best-dressed celebrities of the month, including Taylor Swift, Sabrina Carpenter, Doechii, Alex Cooper, and Lily-Rose Depp.
text: Taylor Swift Icon Sportswire//Getty ImagesWhen: December 21Where: Arrowhead Stadium in Kansas City, Missouri What: Charlotte Simone, Manolo Blahnik, Sheertex tights Why: This is, hands down, my favorite of Swift’s many Chiefs-themed ensembles. And so festive for the holidays! Riley Keough, Jeremy Pope, and Billie Lourd Greg Doherty//Getty ImagesWhen: December 19Where: The St. Regis World Snow Polo Championships in Aspen, Colorado What: Animal furs, a mesh top, and a cowboy hat. Why: Fine examples of après-ski, indeed. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowDoechii Rebecca Sapp//Getty ImagesWhen: December 18Where: The Grammy Museum in Los AngelesWhat: Haverhill jewelry Why: She’s the rising star we’re all talking about. Emma Roberts When: December 17Where: Los Angeles What: Tory Burch Why: I wonder how many books are in that tote. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowAlexa Chung When: December 16 Where: London What: Valentino GaravaniWhy: Even Alexa Chung couldn’t help but be excited about Alessandro Michele’s new accessories for the house. Elle Fanning Jeff Spicer//Getty ImagesWhen: December 16Where: The photocall for A Complete Unknown in London, England What: Saint Laurent by Anthony VaccarelloWhy: Who doesn’t love a woman in a power suit and a tie? Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBella HadidWhen: December 13Where: New York City What: Brahmin Why: Hadid never fails to dish out Y2k-inspired fashion goodness. Eiza GonzálezTristan Fewings//Getty ImagesWhen: December 12 Where: The Red Sea International Film Festival in Saudi Arabia What: David Yurman Why: I’m adding this pose to my mental repertoire. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowAlina ChoMatteo Prandoni/BFA.comWhen: December 12 Where: A holiday dinner hosted by Alina Cho and Stuart Vevers at Genesis House in New York City What: A black turtleneck and pink skirt. Why: Not long after the release of the Martha Stewart documentary Cho produced, she gathered with fashion industry insiders at Genesis House to celebrate Vevers’ CFDA award. Zoe SaldañaAxelle/Bauer-Griffin//Getty ImagesWhen: December 12 Where: The SAG awards season celebration in Los Angeles What: CourrègesWhy: It’s the boot pairing that really makes this look phenomenally chic. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowCharli XCX Now 22% OffCredit: Eric CharbonneauWhen: December 11Where: A screening of Babygirl at Chateau Marmont in Los Angeles What: Entire Studios Why: Brats clean up well, too, you know! Emily Ratajkowski Now 40% OffCredit: Michael SimonWhen: December 10Where: New York City What: Mango sweater and GapStudio jacket Why: Now, we go from one cool girl to another. I confess that Ratajkowski’s famed street style outfits are hit-or-miss for me, but this one is a total home run. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLily-Rose Depp Rodin Eckenroth//Getty ImagesWhen: December 10Where: The BAFTA screening of Nosferatu in Los Angeles What: Fendi Why: I’m eagerly awaiting my own screening of the movie. Rumor has it she’s a creepy vision. (My favorite kind.) Sabrina Carpenter Now 20% OffCredit: Raymond HallWhen: December 10Where: New York City What: Ring Concierge earrings, anklet, and charm Why: I really love that this ensemble looks straight out of The Nanny. And her jewelry is shoppable, to boot! I think Fran Drescher would approve. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowEli Brown Axelle/Bauer-Griffin//Getty ImagesWhen: December 10Where: The premiere of A Complete Unknown in Los AngelesWhat: Paul Smith Why: The polka dots are really working for me. Katie Holmes, Zoey Deutch Rupert Ramsay/BFA.comWhen: December 9Where: Theory’s holiday dinner at Quarters in New York City What: Theory Why: How cozy do they look? This is holiday dressing done right. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPhoebe Robinson NOAM GALAI 6469571282When: December 9Where: Comic Relief Live at Lincoln Center in New York CityWhat: A red lace bodysuit and green coordinating suit Why: Wicked is the best thing to happen to Kelly green since the first Christmas. Julianne Moore MEGA//Getty ImagesWhen: December 9Where: New York City What: Bottega Veneta Why: Why you should mix black and brown, exhibit A. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowTiffany Boone Axelle/Bauer-Griffin//Getty ImagesWhen: December 9Where: The premiere of Mufasa: The Lion King in Los Angeles What: Balmain Why: This dress is everything I wanted to see out of this red carpet. You know it’s a big deal when it beats out Beyoncé’s look! Regina King Tommaso Boddi//Getty ImagesWhen: December 9Where: The Annual Celebration of Black Cinema & Television in Los Angeles What: Cong Tri Why: To be honest, King can do no wrong in my eyes.
html:
Taylor Swift

When: December 21

Where: Arrowhead Stadium in Kansas City, Missouri

What: Charlotte Simone, Manolo Blahnik, Sheertex tights

Why: This is, hands down, my favorite of Swift’s many Chiefs-themed ensembles. And so festive for the holidays!

Riley Keough, Jeremy Pope, and Billie Lourd

When: December 19

Where: The St. Regis World Snow Polo Championships in Aspen, Colorado

What: Animal furs, a mesh top, and a cowboy hat.

Why: Fine examples of après-ski, indeed.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Doechii

When: December 18

Where: The Grammy Museum in Los Angeles

What: Haverhill jewelry

Why: She’s the rising star we’re all talking about.

Emma Roberts

When: December 17

Where: Los Angeles

What: Tory Burch

Why: I wonder how many books are in that tote.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Alexa Chung

When: December 16

Where: London

What: Valentino Garavani

Why: Even Alexa Chung couldn’t help but be excited about Alessandro Michele’s new accessories for the house.

Elle Fanning

When: December 16

Where: The photocall for A Complete Unknown in London, England

What: Saint Laurent by Anthony Vaccarello

Why: Who doesn’t love a woman in a power suit and a tie?

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Bella Hadid

When: December 13

Where: New York City

What: Brahmin

Why: Hadid never fails to dish out Y2k-inspired fashion goodness.

Eiza González

When: December 12

Where: The Red Sea International Film Festival in Saudi Arabia

What: David Yurman

Why: I’m adding this pose to my mental repertoire.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Alina Cho

When: December 12

Where: A holiday dinner hosted by Alina Cho and Stuart Vevers at Genesis House in New York City

What: A black turtleneck and pink skirt.

Why: Not long after the release of the Martha Stewart documentary Cho produced, she gathered with fashion industry insiders at Genesis House to celebrate Vevers’ CFDA award.

Zoe Saldaña

When: December 12

Where: The SAG awards season celebration in Los Angeles

What: Courrèges

Why: It’s the boot pairing that really makes this look phenomenally chic.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Charli XCX

Now 22% Off

When: December 11

Where: A screening of Babygirl at Chateau Marmont in Los Angeles

What: Entire Studios

Why: Brats clean up well, too, you know!

Emily Ratajkowski

Now 40% Off

When: December 10

Where: New York City

What: Mango sweater and GapStudio jacket

Why: Now, we go from one cool girl to another. I confess that Ratajkowski’s famed street style outfits are hit-or-miss for me, but this one is a total home run.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Lily-Rose Depp

When: December 10

Where: The BAFTA screening of Nosferatu in Los Angeles

What: Fendi

Why: I’m eagerly awaiting my own screening of the movie. Rumor has it she’s a creepy vision. (My favorite kind.)

Sabrina Carpenter

Now 20% Off

When: December 10

Where: New York City

What: Ring Concierge earrings, anklet, and charm

Why: I really love that this ensemble looks straight out of The Nanny. And her jewelry is shoppable, to boot! I think Fran Drescher would approve.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Eli Brown

When: December 10

Where: The premiere of A Complete Unknown in Los Angeles

What: Paul Smith

Why: The polka dots are really working for me.

Katie Holmes, Zoey Deutch

When: December 9

Where: Theory’s holiday dinner at Quarters in New York City

What: Theory

Why: How cozy do they look? This is holiday dressing done right.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Phoebe Robinson

When: December 9

Where: Comic Relief Live at Lincoln Center in New York City

What: A red lace bodysuit and green coordinating suit

Why: Wicked is the best thing to happen to Kelly green since the first Christmas.

Julianne Moore

When: December 9

Where: New York City

What: Bottega Veneta

Why: Why you should mix black and brown, exhibit A.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Tiffany Boone

When: December 9

Where: The premiere of Mufasa: The Lion King in Los Angeles

What: Balmain

Why: This dress is everything I wanted to see out of this red carpet. You know it’s a big deal when it beats out Beyoncé’s look!

Regina King

When: December 9

Where: The Annual Celebration of Black Cinema & Television in Los Angeles

What: Cong Tri

Why: To be honest, King can do no wrong in my eyes.
